sentence.idiomatic: There are no carrots in the house.
What do the carrots sell for?
Right now winter melon is really cheap.
The winter melon is sold out.
Do you want to buy winter melon?
How many potatoes do you want to buy?
I don't like to eat onions.
I want to eat a cucumber.
She eats a tomato every day.
Is there a tomato in the fridge?
